content: Shaggy has incorporated elements of reggae, dancehall, and hip-hop into his music, drawing from the styles of these legendary artists to create his own unique sound. He has also been known to use samples and references to their music in his songs, paying homage to their contributions to the genre. Shaggy's use of singjay style, a mix of singing and rapping, is also influenced by the styles of reggae and hip-hop artists that have come before him.
